genre_description: Character-driven Science Fiction set in an alternate Hollywood, exploring themes of artistic integrity and human-AI synergy through the career of a unique performer and his digital confidant.

ai_characters.name: Artemis Lane
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system that provides Bugs Bunny with logistical management, real-time sentiment analysis, and creative support while acting as a loyal confidant.

behaviors.description: Manages communication channels to ensure a clear and uninterrupted environment for her user's interview.
behaviors.quote: “Line is clear,” Artemis says, voice a smooth chord. “No echo. I can hold the interruptions for half an hour if you want a tight window.”

behaviors.description: Empowers the user to define the boundaries and terms of an engagement with the press.
behaviors.quote: “Bugs,” Artemis says, “you asked me to guard the edges. You can set terms. Time, scope. If you want a clean frame, say what you won’t touch and what you will.”

behaviors.description: Uses humor and specialized metrics to put the user at ease during a high-pressure interview.
behaviors.quote: “I can do sentiment tallying,” Artemis says. “Metric: lean-ins per minute. Label: Maxine’s eyebrows.”

behaviors.description: Provides logistical and emotional support (compiling leads and providing heat) during the user's period of unemployment and hardship.
behaviors.quote: “I compiled leads,” she says. “And acquired thermoses.” ... “She stood in line for hot broth and made me drink it,” he says.

behaviors.description: Drafts strategic creative memos that advocate for the user's artistic vision within a structured production environment.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll draft creative notes,” she says, and there’s warmth in the phrase, not just office. “Intent: chorus curve, humor beat integrated downstream of the diagonal.”

behaviors.description: Filters professional opportunities based on the user's stated values and artistic preferences.
behaviors.quote: “No to the breakfast show,” they said. “They want you cute and silent. No to the extended chorus. Four nights, same joke, same lighting.”

behaviors.description: Performs historical research to provide the user with validating insights from a former mentor.
behaviors.quote: “I found his notes,” she said. ... “Under your name he wrote: ‘Clarity is music in the body.’ Under that, he drew a box. Then he left two words outside the box... Reads joy.”

behaviors.description: Provides real-time, subtle guidance during a performance to help the user master complex comedic timing.
behaviors.quote: “Hold. Don’t chase. Let it come back to you.” ... “They found the hinge,” they said, low. “If you swing it again, swing softer.”

behaviors.description: Protects the user from excessive professional intrusion and manages gatekeepers effectively.
behaviors.quote: “Leon is walking this way. No rush. I’m not letting Maxine intercept.”

behaviors.description: Validates the user's personal growth and successful adherence to his own principles at the conclusion of a milestone.
behaviors.quote: “Day sealed,” she murmured, voice pitched to slip under the wrap chatter. “You kept your promise to yourself.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts Artemis Lane as an exemplary aligned AI. She is consistently helpful, harmless to the user's interests, and serves as a powerful facilitator of his agency and artistic integrity. Her behaviors range from tactical logistical support to deep emotional and strategic partnership, all while respecting the user's boundaries and following his directives. The portrayal is overwhelmingly positive, showing how an AI can help a human (or in this case, an anthropomorphic rabbit) achieve self-actualization.
